医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
卡路里标签可以帮助人们选择稍微少一点的卡路里一项新的 Cochrane 评论发现，菜单和产品上的食物卡路里标签会导致人们选择略少卡路里的食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Calorie-labeling-can-help-people-choose-slightly-fewer-calories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Calorie-labeling-can-help-people-choose-slightly-fewer-calories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c1e2524f-c7ac-4aae-a68d-57b376dced6c Fri, 17 Jan 2025 07:13:48 -0500 Calorie labeling can help people choose slightly fewer calories
研究发现肠道细菌可以减少糖尿病小鼠和人类的糖摄入量过多的糖摄入与多种非传染性疾病有关，包括肥胖、心血管疾病、代谢综合征和 2 型糖尿病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Intestinal-bacter-found-to-reduce-sugar-intake-in-diabetic-mice-and- humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Intestinal-bacter-found-to-reduce-sugar-intake-in-diabetic-mice-and- humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37b4c0d3-5a5b-4390-88c1-3ebddc0eed60 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:58:17 -0500 Intestinal bacterium found to reduce sugar intake in diabetic mice and humans
通过突破性的基因研究诊断出超过 500 名欧洲患者​超过 500 名病情不明的欧洲患者通过新的基因研究得到了诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Over-500-European-病人-diagnosed-through-groundwriting-genic-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Over-500-European-病人-diagnosed-through-groundwriting-genic-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cd94e81-15c0-4852-8e5a-ffb7776bd95b Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:20:07 -0500 Over 500 European patients diagnosed through groundbreaking genetic research
亨廷顿病的早期大脑变化在症状出现前二十年就被发现伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，亨廷顿舞蹈症患者的大脑发生了微妙的变化，可以通过先进的成像、血液和脊髓液分析来检测，这种变化比临床运动诊断早了大约二十年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-brain-changes-in-Huntingtone28099s-disease-Detected-two-decades-before-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Early-brain-changes-in-Huntingtone28099s-disease-Detected-two-decades-before-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75f7bde2-b592-4788-bf21-2628f5a1e27b Fri, 17 Jan 2025 06:08:52 -0500 Early brain changes in Huntington’s disease detected two decades before symptoms
随着华盛顿权力的转移，垃圾食品变成了公众恶棍新的特朗普政府可能会来抢你的零食。多年来，联邦政府一直回避对垃圾食品、快餐和超加工食品进行监管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Junk-food-turns-public-villain-as-power-shifts-in-Washington.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Junk-food-turns-public-villain-as-power-shifts-in-Washington.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eff826be-abd8-4d4c-9880-2ff4f9efec0a Fri, 17 Jan 2025 05:52:15 -0500 Junk food turns public villain as power shifts in Washington
对于无家可归的老年人来说，获得稳定的住房需要整个村庄的努力，而且需要很大的运气两年多前，金·希尔顿和他的伴侣最后一次走出家门。房子卖了，新房东提高了租金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/For-homeless-seniors-getting-into-stable-housing-takes-a-village-e28094-and-a-lot-of-luck.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/For-homeless-seniors-getting-into-stable-housing-takes-a-village-e28094-and-a-lot-of-luck.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4603a444-a98c-4dca-93f8-ec564bcb802f Fri, 17 Jan 2025 05:49:05 -0500 For homeless seniors, getting into stable housing takes a village — and a lot of luck
BIOHIT 获得 Biomedal 麸质免疫原性肽测试的欧洲经销权BIOHIT 很高兴地宣布与 Biomedal 达成协议，提供其 iVYLISA、iVYCHECK 和 GlutenDetect 麸质免疫原性肽 (GIP) 测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/BIOHIT-secures-European-distribution-rights-for-Biomedale28099s-gluten-immunogenic-peptide-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/BIOHIT-secures-European-distribution-rights-for-Biomedale28099s-gluten-immunogenic-peptide-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc7e05b4-5e6b-40d0-b1fa-9b494f18bf62 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 05:38:00 -0500 BIOHIT secures European distribution rights for Biomedal’s gluten immunogenic peptide tests
新研究确定了对抗抗生素耐药细菌感染的代谢目标针对病原体独特的代谢途径为精准抗生素提供了一种新方法，解决了日益严峻的抗菌素耐药性挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-research-identizes-metabolic-targets-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-research-identizes-metabolic-targets-to-combat-antibiotic-pressive-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86d68a09-745d-4a05-838d-c2d11eb427fa Fri, 17 Jan 2025 05:30:00 -0500 New research identifies metabolic targets to combat antibiotic-resistant bacterial infections
对糖和脂肪做出反应的大脑神经元为肥胖控制提供了新见解该研究发现海马神经元对糖和脂肪的反应存在差异，这提出了通过靶向治疗对抗肥胖的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Brain-neurons-that-respond-to-sugar-and-fat-offer-new-insights-into-obesity-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Brain-neurons-that-respond-to-sugar-and-fat-offer-new-insights-into-obesity-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aab9d605-e5ac-4c51-8316-9a186a0acf05 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 04:50:00 -0500 Brain neurons that respond to sugar and fat offer new insights into obesity control
托法替尼可降低 PTPN2 缺陷患者的 SARS-CoV-2 感染风险研究人员报告称，托法替尼能够降低缺乏 PTPN2 的个体感染 SARS-CoV-2 的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Tofacitinib-reduces-SARS-CoV-2-infection-risk-in-患者-with-PTPN2-deficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Tofacitinib-reduces-SARS-CoV-2-infection-risk-in-患者-with-PTPN2-deficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b4f717-06c5-4657-a78d-1adcd86038fb Fri, 17 Jan 2025 04:18:00 -0500 Tofacitinib reduces SARS-CoV-2 infection risk in patients with PTPN2 deficiency
